dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: AV infringement - FAPL_NRID13515]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not
identify (a) the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed and (b)
the material that is claimed to be infringing, and information
reasonably sufficient to permit the The Planet to locate the said
material. 

 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Thursday, June 08, 2006 8:39 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: AV infringement -
FAPL_NRID13515]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: AV infringement -
FAPL_NRID13515]


For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: AV infringement - FAPL_NRID13515
Date: Thu, 08 Jun 2006 14:29:31 +0100
From: Tim Cooper <TimC@nr-online.com>
To: services@watchtvonnet.com <services@watchtvonnet.com>
CC: abuse@theplanet.com <abuse@theplanet.com>

NetResult Internal Reference:  FAPL_NRID13515

Please quote the above FAPL_NRID13515 reference in all communications
with us regarding this issue.

Dear Sirs

The FA Premier League has the exclusive right to commercially exploit
all matches within The FA Premier League championships including, but
not limited to, all moving images and other audio/video content.

We have noticed that your Web Site http://watchtvonnet.com  is
displaying and/or offering The FA Premier League's audio visual content.

As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from The FA Premier
League to use this content, your present use is an infringement of The
FA Premier League's rights.

Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your
web sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so.

Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute
an express or implied waiver of any of The FA Premier League's rights or
remedies, including any rights or remedies in respect of infringement
not explicitly stated, whether current or in the future, all of which
are expressly reserved.


Formal Declaration


I hereby state that The FA Premier League is the owner of the exclusive
rights referenced above and that NetResult is authorised to act on its
behalf with respect to internet monitoring and compliance. On behalf of
The FA Premier League I hereby state that I have a good faith belief
that use of the content in the manner complained of is not authorised by
The FA Premier League, its agents, or the law.

I, Tim Cooper, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign
this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the
United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of
perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.



Yours sincerely,


Tim Cooper
NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA
Tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1730
Fax:
Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB

Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.


--------------------------------------------------------------------
NetResult - World Leaders in Online Intellectual Property Management
--------------------------------------------------------------------
